attributes.background:
For too long, the Sun newspaper has continued to spout vile, disgusting views about many things, ranging from the Hillsborough disaster, to the most recent debacle with Fatima Manji wearing a hijab on C4.
They have shown no remorse, and believe they are untouchable.
Lets show them they're wrong.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. The press are operationally and editorially independent of both the UK Government and Parliament.

You may wish to make a complaint to the Independent Press Standards Organisation (IPSO), which regulates the UK newspaper industry. You can find out more here:

https://www.ipso.co.uk/IPSO/makeacomplaint.html
